short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Official minimarks extension for Google Chrome. Bookmark the current tab by clicking the toolbar icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark tabs by clicking the minimarks toolbar icon. This is the official minimarks extension for Google Chrome.
